author: Biju Govind
title: Lift lockdown gradually: experts
description: Fears over second wave of pandemic
content:
Amid talks of lifting the 21-day lockdown in Kerala, health experts have warned the outbreak of second wave of the COVID-19 that commenced with first three positive cases of three students from Wuhan province in China on January 30.
